p: SDK, DE, OVDSJW, WDR, GASP, and SMH designed the study. SDK, DE, and JCH collected the medicinal plant material, and SDK, DE, JCH, LR, and RN carried out the experimental work. SDK and DE wrote the first draft of the manuscript. SDK, DE, JCH, LR, RN, OVDSJW, and SMH performed the data analysis. SDK, WDR, GASP, and SMH critically revised the manuscript. All authors contributed to the final version of the manuscript. The manuscript has been read and approved by all the authors and each author believes that the manuscript represents honest work.
